titles.title: To amend the Mutual Educational and Cultural Exchange Act of 1961 to exclude the Government of the People's Republic of China from eligible foreign governments with which Federal employees may participate in cultural exchange.
End Misleading Cultural Exchanges Act
End Misleading Cultural Exchanges Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary:
End Misleading Cultural Exchanges Act
This bill bars a federal employee from accepting certain assistance, such as a grant, from China's government to facilitate that federal employee's participation in a cultural exchange program.
